hero.subtitle: A fan translation project powered by Nintendo fans from all over the world.

about.title: What is Ninternational?
about.subtitle: Ninternational is a collaborative effort project whose aim is to make as many Nintendo games as possible accessible to as many people as possible on as many systems as possible. Everybody is welcome, whether you have modding knowledge that can help out, would like some help translating a specific game or just want your translations to have more exposure, simply join our Discord server!

footer.disclaimer: Ninternational is a fan-driven translation group. It is not affiliated with Nintendo or any of its subsidiaries. No copyright infringement is intended.
